answers.answer: Hi...have u been tested for diabetes?...EDS, or ne  related condition?It is possible to have a few things going on such as GERD acid/reflux....reflux will cause hunger like sensations as ur body is over producing acids used to break down food.....these acids are generally produced when ur body prepares to eat, which is y we feel hungry......reflux is a common issue with us Chiarians.Shaking and or tremors can also be a symptom of EDS (ehlers-danlos) ....But as I mentioned u should look into family history for issues like diabetes...Another condition to rule out is an auto immune thyroid condition...Since I do have GERD< Hashimoto's thyroiditis  and EDS I have had symptoms similar to what u described....

I have had the shakiness for the last few months especially in the legs and accompanied by weakness.  Followed up with my endocrinologist who sent me home with a blood sugar monitor.  For me, it was not the problem.Still don't know what it is but am also encountering much more painful migraines so was just contributing it to that.  When the migraine calmsdown generally the shakiness does as well.The mornings seem to be worse for this.

I have had the shakiness for the last few months especially in the legs and accompanied by weakness.  Followed up with my endocrinologist who sent me home with a blood sugar monitor.  For me, it was not the problem.Still don't know what it is but am also encountering much more painful migraines so was just contributing it to that.  When the migraine calmsdown generally the shakiness does as well.The mornings seem to be worse for this.
Glad to hear the sugar levels were checked and ruled out., I would look to EDS as a possible reason now.

question: Lately I have had a new, strange symptom. I eat regularly and I'm generally in good shape, but lately I have the sensation that I haven't eaten even if I just did. I will get light headed 'food related' type feeling head aches and the shakes. Even after eating again it does not stop. I am tracking my calories and water intake to make sure I am eating enough and the right foods and I am, does anybody else have this weird symptom?
title: New symptom!
